Package fr.univparis.metro

Class Trafics

java.lang.Object
fr.univparis.metro.Trafics
public class Trafics
extends Object
Allows the set up of trafics pertubations.

    • getGraph

      public static WGraph<Station> getGraph​(String city)
      Return the subway graph of a city which might have been modified with perturbation
      Parameters:
      city - the city which we want the graph
      Returns:
      the subway graph of the city

    • getInitialGraph

      public static WGraph<Station> getInitialGraph​(String city)
      Return the original subway graph of a city (without any perturbation)
      Parameters:
      city - the city which we want the original graph
      Returns:
      the original subway graph of the station

    • getPerturbation

      public static Set<String> getPerturbation​(String city)
      Return a set containing all the names of the perturbations
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want the perturbation
      Returns:
      a set containing all the names of the perturbations

    • getCities

      public static Set<String> getCities()
      Return a set of cities that are in the model
      Returns:
      a set of the cities that are in the model

    • initTrafics

      public static void initTrafics()
      Initialize the trafics with files that are in Configuration
      See Also:
      Configuration

    • addPerturbation

      public static void addPerturbation​(String city, Trafics.Perturbation type, String name, Object parameter)
      Add a trafic perturbation The revert graph of this perturbation will be stored in reverts
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which the perturbation occured
      type - the type of the perturbation
      name - the name of the perturbation
      parameter - is the paramerer of the perturbation (for example the name of the line not working)

    • revertPerturbation

      public static void revertPerturbation​(String city, String name)
      Revert a perturbation
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which the perturbation occured
      name - the name of the perturbation

    • lineShutdown

      public static WGraph<Station> lineShutdown​(String city, String line)
      Modify the graph g so that we can't take a line
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      line - the line we want to shutdown
      Returns:
      a WGraph that we can use to revert this perturbation

    • lineSlowDown

      public static WGraph<Station> lineSlowDown​(String city, String line, double times)
      Modify the time between stations in a graph
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      line - the line affected by the perturbation
      times - the time between every station of the line will be multipclated by it
      Returns:
      a WGraph that can be use to revert this perturbation

    • entireStationShutDown

      public static WGraph<Station> entireStationShutDown​(String city, String station)
      Modify the graph g so that we can't stop or start by a station Passing over the station will still be possible
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      station - the station we want to shutdown
      Returns:
      a WGraph that we can use to revert this perturbation

    • partOfStationShutDown

      public static WGraph<Station> partOfStationShutDown​(String city, Station st)
      Modify the graph g so that we can't take one line of a station
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      st - the station (name and line) we can't stop by
      Returns:
      a WGraph that we can use to revert this perturbation

    • partOfLineShutDown

      public static WGraph<Station> partOfLineShutDown​(String city, Station start, Station end)
      Modify the graph g so we can't take a line from one station to an other one
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      start - the start of the shutdown
      end - the end of the shutdown
      Returns:
      a WGraph that we can use to revert this perturbation Note that start and end stations must be one the same line

    • partOfLineSlowDown

      public static WGraph<Station> partOfLineSlowDown​(String city, Station start, Station end, Double times)
      Modify the graph g so that a part of the line is slow down
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to add the perturbation
      start - the start of the slow down
      end - the end of the slow down
      times - the time for every traject concerned will be multiplied by it
      Returns:
      a WGraph that can be use to revert this perturbation Note that the start and end stations must be on the same line

    • allTraficsSlowDown

      public static WGraph<Station> allTraficsSlowDown​(String city, double times)
      Modify the time between stations in a graph
      Parameters:
      city - the city in which we want to modify trafics
      times - the time between every station will be multipclated by it
      Returns:
      a WGraph that can be use to revert this perturbation
